item.title: Attaching event listeners in FOR loop
item.description: Introduction A friend who was getting into tech was developing a GUI calculator in vanilla JS. In the process, he noticed a bug, and after searching the web, he found an article that talks about his problem event listeners in loops This post is an in-depth explanation of the problem and possible solutions. Statement of Problem In building a calculator application, there are a series of buttons for selecting particular numbers.
